definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: go straight, go on, advance (As. ašâru Zim:BP 11; Ar. Aram. in deriv.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Imv. [[אִשְׁרוּ]] Pr 9:6 [[אִשְׁרוּ בְדֶרֶח בִּינׇה]] go straight on in the way of understanding.
intensive go straight on, advance Pr 4:14.
causative lead on Pr 23:19, Is 3:12, Is 9:15.
pronounce happy, call blessed Ge 30:13 (J) Job 29:11, Ps 72:17, Pr 31:28, Ct So 6:9, Mal 3:12, Mal 3:15.
be made happy, blessed Ps 41:3, Pr 3:18.
